Hero.title: Simplify Customer Service with AI and WhatsApp
Hero.description: Transform how you interact with your customers by integrating intelligent tools that optimize your business and boost your results. Let's take your business to the next level with Hello Galaxy.

Projects.title: My work
Projects.description2: The following projects showcase my skills and experience through examples of my real-world work. You can see each project in production. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies and manage projects effectively.

project1.description: A web-based platform that allows users to monitor and analyze cross-chain transactions on the Solana IBC. Developed using Next.js, GraphQL, and Tailwind, this project showcases my expertise in building complex, high-performance web applications with a focus on blockchain technology

project2.description: A web application that serves to create alerts and monitor different blockchain networks, cryptocurrency wallets and offers a large number of transaction analysis and monitoring options.

project3.description: A platform for pet lovers to find and share information about pets, including adoption, training, and care tips. manages veterinarians and pet stores.

project4.description: A chatbot AI that allows users to chat with a chatbot and get answers to their questions about the company and the services they offer.

PainPointsBlock.title: Solve Customer Service Challenges
PainPointsBlock.description: Hello Galaxy offers solutions designed to overcome the most common challenges in customer interaction.

paintPoint1.title: Fast and Personalized Responses
paintPoint1.description: Serve your customers instantly, providing accurate information and efficient support at all times.

paintPoint2.title: Time Optimization
paintPoint2.description: Automate repetitive tasks and focus more time on strategies that drive your business growth.

paintPoint3.title: Seamless Integration
paintPoint3.description: Connect WhatsApp, Google Sheets, and Chatwoot to manage conversations, store data, and enhance customer experience.

SolutionShowcase.title: Simple and Effective Solutions
SolutionShowcase.description: Hello Galaxy integrates advanced technology into an easy-to-use platform tailored to each customer's needs.

solution1.title: Diseño y Desarrollo Web
solution1.description: Personaliza tu atención al cliente con bots impulsados por IA que responden preguntas, brindan soporte técnico y facilitan ventas.

solution2.title: Aplicaciones Web a Medida
solution2.description: Desarrollamos soluciones web escalables y seguras para automatizar procesos, gestionar datos y mejorar la eficiencia operativa.

solution3.title: Infraestructura y Datos en la Nube
solution3.description: Configuramos tu infraestructura en la nube y organizamos tus datos con herramientas como Google Sheets, Firestore o BigQuery, AWS.

solution4.title: Tiendas Online
solution4.description: Lanzamos tu e-commerce en plataformas como Shopify y Tiendanube, integrando diseño, pagos y funcionalidades personalizadas.

solution5.title: Marketing en Instagram
solution5.description: Creamos contenido visual atractivo: publicaciones, reels y stories que conectan con tu audiencia y potencian tu marca.

solution6.title: Automatización de Procesos y Chatbots
solution6.description: Implementamos flujos automatizados con bots para atención al cliente, generación de leads o gestión interna. Simplificá tareas repetitivas con tecnología inteligente.

InteractiveDemo.title: Try Hello Galaxy
InteractiveDemo.description: Discover how our technology simplifies customer service and enhances your team's efficiency.

FeatureHighlight.title: Why Choose Hello Galaxy
FeatureHighlight.description: Our solutions stand out for their simplicity, efficiency, and adaptability.

feature1.title: Total Personalization
feature1.description: Configure the chatbot to meet your business's specific needs.

feature2.title: Clear and Flexible Pricing
feature2.description: Choose a plan that fits the size and needs of your operation.

feature3.title: Guaranteed Scalability
feature3.description: Cover from 1,000 to 100,000 conversations per month, adapting to your business growth.

feature4.title: Complete Integration
feature4.description: Easily connect with Meta, Google Sheets, and Chatwoot to optimize every interaction.

Pricing.title: Affordable and Adaptable Plans
Pricing.description: Our plans are designed to suit businesses of all sizes.

plan1.title: Basic Plan
plan1.description: Ideal for small businesses starting with automated customer service.

plan3.title: Custom Plan
plan3.description: Solutions tailored to businesses with specific needs.

CallToAction.title: Ready to Simplify Customer Service?
CallToAction.description: Start today and transform how you manage your business.
